LongInfoPerLevel.0:
If an attack (except with agony damage) were to kill you but the overkill damage amounts to less than 20%/25%/30% of your maximum hit points, you will heal yourself for 20%/25%/30% of your maximum hit points. Only after that is the damage applied.
In addition, all your spell cooldowns are reduced by 60 seconds.

Cooldown: 30h/20h/10h
The cooldown is only reduced while the character has a battle sign.

In addition, all your spell cooldowns are reduced by 60 seconds.

In addition, all your spell cooldowns are reduced by 60 seconds.

Cooldown: 30h/20h/10h
The cooldown is only reduced while the character has a battle sign.

6.Name: Avatar of Light
6.ShortInfo: Transforms you into a powerful form that reduces damage taken and increases damage dealt.

LongInfoPerLevel.0:
This beam spell deals death damage. Damage and length increase with higher spell stages.
Cooldown: 10/8/6 seconds

In addition, for each target hit by a beam spell, the cooldown of all other spells is reduced by 1 sec (up to a maximum of 3 sec) and the damage of beam spells is increased by 10%/12%/14% (up to a maximum of 30%/36%/42%).
LongInfoPerLevel.1:
This beam spell deals death damage. Damage and length increase with higher spell stages.

LongInfoPerLevel.3:

LargePerkInfos.ExtraDamageHealingInfo:
Unlocked Revelation Perks grant a bonus to all damage and healing:
  • Stage 1 grants a bonus of +4 damage and healing
  • Stage 2 increases this bonus to +9
  • Stage 3 increases this bonus to +20
LargePerkInfos.GeneralInfo:
To unlock a Revelation Perk, you need to distribute promotion points in the corresponding domain.
To unlock stage 1 of a Revelation Perk, you need 250 promotion points. Stage 2 requires 500 promotion points. As soon as you have distributed 1000 promotion points, stage 3 is unlocked.
Revelation Mastery, which can be found on some gems, provides additional points to unlock Revelation Perks.

Unlocked Revelation Perks grant a bonus to all damage and healing:
  • Stage 1 grants a bonus of +4 damage and healing
  • Stage 2 increases this bonus to +9
  • Stage 3 increases this bonus to +20

7.LongInfo: Applies to sword, axe and club fighting
7.Name: Weapon Skill Boost

8.LongInfo:
Gain +6 shielding and +1 sword/axe/club fighting when 5 creatures are on adjacent squares.
For each additional creature, up to a maximum of 8, you get +6 shielding and +1 sword/axe/club fighting more.
8.Name: Battle Instinct

9.LongInfo: For each creature challenged, you will heal yourself for a small amount. This amount scales with your shielding skill. Heals for double the amount if you have less than 60% of your hit points and triple the amount if you have less than 30% of your hit points.
9.Name: Battle Healing

11.Name: Augmented Intense Wound Cleansing|Aug. Intense Wound Cleansing

12.Aug1Info: Adds 5% life leech to this spell
12.Name: Augmented Front Sweep|Aug. Front Sweep

16.LongInfo:
The critical extra damage for attacks with a crossbow is increased by 10%.
While wielding a bow your attacks and spells treat the targets physical and holy sensitivity as being 2% higher.
16.Name: Ballistic Mastery

17.LongInfo: Gain +3 distance fighting while no monster is within 1 squares. Otherwise gain +3 holy magic level and +3 healing magic level.
17.Name: Positional Tactics

19.Aug1Info: Focus secondary group cooldown -8s. Attacks and spells are enabled but dealt damage is reduced by 50%.
19.Aug2Info: -6s Cooldown and the damage dealt is no longer reduced.
19.Name: Augmented Swift Foot|Aug. Swift Foot

21.Name: Augmented Strong Ethereal Spear|Aug. Strong Ethereal Spear

22.Aug1Info: Enables the casting of support spells while active and Focus secondary group cooldown -8s
22.Aug2Info: -6s Cooldown; distance skill bonus increased by +5%
22.Name: Augmented Sharpshooter|Aug. Sharpshooter

23.LongInfo: Increases the damage of your next damage spell by 35% within 12 seconds after casting a focus spell.
23.Name: Focus Mastery

24.Aug1Info: Adds 15% critical extra damage for this spell and grants a 10% chance (non-cumulative) for a critical hit.
24.Name: Augmented Great Fire Wave|Aug. Great Fire Wave

27.Aug1Info: Damage Increase for Hell's Core and Rage of the Skies
27.Aug2Info: -4s Cooldown; Focus secondary group cooldown -4s for Hell's Core and Rage of the Skies
27.Name: Augmented Focus Spells|Aug. Focus Spells

28.LongInfo: If you heal someone with Nature's Embrace or Heal Friend, you also heal yourself for 10% of the applied healing.
28.Name: Healing Link

30.Aug2Info: Adds 5% life leech to this spell
30.Name: Augmented Terra Wave|Aug. Terra Wave

31.Aug1Info: Adds 3% mana leech to this spell
31.Name: Augmented Strong Ice Wave|Aug. Strong Ice Wave

35.LongInfo: If you use a rune, you have a 25% chance of increasing your magic level by 10%, or by 20% if you use a rune that can be created by your vocation.
35.Name: Runic Mastery

37.LongInfo: Each level of Vessel Resonance unlocks equivalent Gem Mods in its domain. If the Vessel Resonance matches the gem quality, a damage and healing bonus is granted.
37.Name: Vessel Resonance Top Left|VR Top Left

MediumPerkInfos.AugGeneralInfo:
The Conviction Perk is unlocked when the maximum number of promotion points for this slice has been assigned.

There are always two identical Augmentations within the Wheel of Destiny. Regardless of the order of unlocking, bonus I will always be available before bonus II.
MediumPerkInfos.GeneralInfo:
The Conviction Perk is unlocked when the maximum number of promotion points for this slice has been assigned.

Most Conviction Perks can be found more than once within the Wheel of Destiny. When they are unlocked, their effect adds up.

SliceRightClickInfo: Fill or empty a slice with a right-click.

VesselInfos.GemInfo:
Gems can be revealed within the Gem Atelier. Different gem qualities yield different amounts of mods:
  • Lesser gem: one basic mod
  • Regular gem: two basic mods
  • Greater gem: two basic mods and one supreme mod
VesselInfos.VesselInfo:
If the Vessel Resonance matches the gem quality in this domain, a bonus of +1 to all damage and healing is granted. This bonus is increased by 1 for greater gems.

Regardless of the match, gems will always grant mod bonuses based on the Vessel Resonance.
  • Lesser gems match Dormant Vessels (VR I)
  • Regular gems match Awakened Vessels (VR II)
  • Greater gems match Radiant Vessels (VR III)
